channel.title: Dueling+Report Abuse Glitch - |-| E |_ P
channel.description: Okay there is a bug in Devolution 7.0 where you can stake another player and just click 'report abuse' to get there items. I find it funny that everyone says there is a tutorial to fix this and people tell me to search google, yet they can't even find it themselves. If you actually know the link to the tutorial or how to fix it, it would be very much appreciated.

item.title: Dueling+Report Abuse Glitch - |-| E |_ P
item.dc:creator: @Torax Torax
item.description:
@Torax wrote:

Yea I’m pretty sure I will have 500 online at one time and I do have a SHIT LOAD of RAM and I do have almost unlimited bandwidth. And if you wanna dis my server because its Dodian then dont even post here because you’re just making it harder for me to get my answer.

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling+Report Abuse Glitch - |-| E |_ P
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

Torax:

Well, I would like to have my server moderated to a certain level where my mods can get to the problem right away and get it taken care of. The forums may be too slow to catch the abuser. The reason for this is I will be having more then 500 players online at one time. I’m gonna need the report abuse button.

Seriously doubt your going to get 500 players online.
I’m sorry but, you would need a Dedicated host with a shit load of RAM & Bandwidth. Which is about $120 monthly.
& if you’re trying to rebuild dodian, Don’t. You & the rest of the dodian players are all creating a server for everyone to play on. It won’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Dueling+Report Abuse Glitch - |-| E |_ P
item.dc:creator: @Torax Torax
item.description:
@Torax wrote:

Yes I’m pretty sure the report abuse button works fine, it always has. Getting rid of Dueling or ‘report abuse’ is not an option for me. So please, if you can’t help me don’t bother.

Read full topic
